price: (7) Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them, if you would be certain.
arabic: رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: rabbi al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā in kuntum mūqinīna
